video.title: Drugs, Inc.
video.synopsis: This absorbing documentary series follows the entire supply chain of the illicit drug trade, tracing its production, export, sale and consumption.

episodes.synopsis: With origins in Eastern Europe, codeine-derived Krokodil has horrific consequences for users -- and side effects you wouldn't believe.
episodes.title: Flesh-Eating Krokodil

episodes.synopsis: The cocaine that winds up in the hands of Hollywood's red-carpet elite has humble roots as a Peruvian farm crop that's handled by a powerful cartel.
episodes.title: Cocaine White Gold

episodes.synopsis: Following the money for super meth, the most addictive form of crystal meth around, leads to the Sinaloa Cartel and its extremely violent drug wars.
episodes.title: Super Meth

episodes.synopsis: The demand for California Sour Diesel, a powerful marijuana that produces instant highs, creates violent competition among drug traffickers.
episodes.title: Marijuana Mayhem

episodes.synopsis: The explosive popularity of molly, a rebranding of ultra-pure ecstasy, is causing a tug of war between law enforcement and new-wave drug dealers.
episodes.title: Manic Molly

episodes.synopsis: As New York City counts down to midnight, partying creates spikes in illegal drug use that lead to street violence and strains on police resources.
episodes.title: New Year's Eve NYC

episodes.synopsis: In Columbus, Ohio, heroin has never been more addictive. Meanwhile, in Mexico, soldiers are risking their lives to stop the cartels that supply it.
episodes.title: Hardcore Heroin

episodes.synopsis: A link between Mardi Gras partying and increased drug traffic challenges both the DEA and local law enforcement in New Orleans.
episodes.title: Mardi Gras

episodes.synopsis: Florida's spring break tradition means increased drug use, particularly "molly." A music festival in Miami only adds to law enforcement's problems.
episodes.title: Spring Break

episodes.synopsis: The Fourth of July holiday in Chicago, one of the most dangerous cities in the U.S., leads to high demand for drugs and violence among dealers.
episodes.title: Sin-dependence Day

episodes.synopsis: Dealers compete in a buyer's market to be the first to deliver to Wall Street brokers, who are willing to pay top dollar for the purest cocaine.
episodes.title: The Real Wolves of Wall Street

episodes.synopsis: In the hip-hop music industry, drug money is used by aspiring rappers to pay for studio time, and by promoters to pay musicians to perform at shows.
episodes.title: Hip-Hop High

episodes.synopsis: After several HIV scares, the Los Angeles porn industry's traditional tolerance of on-set drug use is changing, but meth and cocaine remain popular.
episodes.title: X-Rated High

episodes.synopsis: Independent dealers take big risks selling to tourists in Cancún, Mexico. On-call hit men scour the party scene for poachers on the cartels' turf.
episodes.title: Cancun Spring Break

episodes.synopsis: Prison officials battle against the infiltration of crystal meth into California's Santa Rita Jail, and heroin into New Jersey's Bergen County Jail.
episodes.title: Jailhouse Junkies

episodes.synopsis: Santo, a cocaine wholesaler who is part of New York City's dominating Dominican cartel, cuts and compresses cocaine received via the Caribbean route.
episodes.title: Big Apple Coke

episodes.synopsis: Detroit's dealers compete to sell to partygoers at raves in the 48 hours leading up to Halloween. Meanwhile, the police and feds are on the prowl.
episodes.title: Detroit Halloween

episodes.synopsis: As police crack down on Pittsburgh's heroin kingpins, aspiring dealers try to muscle their way into the trade. One kingpin considers a new market.
episodes.title: Pittsburgh Smack

episodes.synopsis: Crackdowns on cocaine trafficking in California's Silicon Valley have led dealers and users to seek an alternative that can be produced locally: meth.
episodes.title: Silicon Valley High

episodes.synopsis: On New York City's Staten Island, a crackdown on prescription pills has spurred young users to seek heroin instead, leading to an epidemic of addicts.
episodes.title: Heroin Island, NYC

episodes.synopsis: Due to the free movement of goods and people over its borders, West Africa has become a new route for trafficking cocaine from Peru to Europe.
episodes.title: Euro Coke

episodes.synopsis: Although biker gangs currently control the majority of the crystal meth market in Australia, Chinese triads are quickly gaining ground in the trade.
episodes.title: Aussie Ice Wars

episodes.synopsis: Getting meth into the hands of users in Austin, Texas, involves a network of traffickers, runners and smugglers -- and dodging the Border Patrol.
episodes.title: Tex Meth

episodes.synopsis: As National Weed Day approaches, marijuana growers and dealers prepare to fill the widespread demand from Boston's student population.
episodes.title: Boston Weed Party

episodes.synopsis: Gang warfare and a strong police presence in suburban Vancouver, British Columbia, cause some dealers to move their business operations downtown.
episodes.title: Shooting Up Suburbia

episodes.synopsis: Used by Thailand's working class, meth pill Yaba has led to an addiction epidemic. Higher-priced crystal meth is sold in Bangkok's red-light district.
episodes.title: Bangkok Ice
